comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Compile the following code using advanced optimizations. document.getElementById("id").style.appearance = "button"; document.getElementById("id").style.resize = "both"; What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Output expected : as same as the input Output seen instead: (formatted) document.getElementById("id").style.a = "button"; document.getElementById("id").style.b = "both"; What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? This error is with the live version at http://closure-compiler.appspot.com/home.
